title: The Slope Recipe
full_text:
The Slope Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2 1/2
ounces
rye whiskey
3/4
ounce
Punt e Mes (an Italian
vermouth
)
1/4
ounce
apricot brandy
(Marie Brizard’s Apry is recommended)
1
dash
Angostura
bitters
Directions
Combine ingredients in a bar glass and add cracked ice. Stir well for 20 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
